title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Microsoft gave FBI a set of BitLocker encryption keys to unlock suspects’ laptops: reports
items.description: The FBI served Microsoft a warrant requesting encryption recovery keys to decrypt the hard drives of people involved in an alleged fraud case in Guam.

items.title: Best Action Cameras (2026), Tested and Reviewed
items.description: Gearing up to shred the slopes or dive into the seas? These photography tools are made for danger.

items.title: TikTok-like microdramas are going to make billions this year, even though they kind of suck
items.description: The business model behind these apps replicates the same dark patterns as mobile games.

items.title: This startup will send 1,000 people’s ashes to space — affordably — in 2027
items.description: Started by an engineer who worked on the space shuttle program, and at Blue Origin, Space Beyond has a spot on a 2027 Falcon 9 flight.

items.title: Roborock Qrevo Curv 2 Flow Review: The Most Beautiful, Best Robot Vacuum
items.description: Roborock hasn’t updated its popular, affordable Qrevo Curv line of robovacs for years. Finally, it’s happening!

items.title: TikTok finalizes deal to create new US entity and avoid ban
items.description: The deal ends a six-year long political saga that that started in 2020 when President Donald Trump tried to ban the app over national security concern...

items.title: OpenAI chief Sam Altman plans India visit as AI leaders converge in New Delhi: sources
items.description: Sam Altman is set for his first India visit in nearly a year.

items.title: The Best Paper Notebooks and Journals, Tested and Reviewed (2026): Leuchttherm, Midori, Field Notes
items.description: Celebrate National Handwriting Day (I did not make that up) with new notebooks, a journal, or sketchbooks.

items.title: Lenovo LOQ 15 Review: The Best Gaming Laptop Under $1,000
items.description: It's rare to find a gaming laptop under $1,000 without any major compromises, but the Lenovo LOQ 15 surprises.

items.title: The Best Over-the-Counter Sleep Aids (2026), Tested and Reviewed
items.description: I tested an array of alternative sleep aids, from gummies to wearable patches, to see if they would help my chronic insomnia.
